resources.string:
As the admin user, you will be able to create quizzes and upload a tutorial video for the quizzes you create (each quiz can only have one video associated with it), as well as view the results of the users that take the quizzes you create. 

To add a Quiz, click on the + button on the Quizzes screen. You can then enter as many questions as you'd like for the quiz. Each question is multiple choice, and has 4 options. You can choose the correct answer by selecting the appropriate option in the drop down menu. 

To record a video, click on the video record button for the appropriate quiz. You can then record the tutorial video and upload it. Once the video has been uploaded, all the users of the app will be able to download and view it. If you'd like to replace a video for a quiz, click on the same video recorder icon and repeat the process. The app will then overwrite your previous video. 

To view a video, click on the download button for the appropriate quiz. This will download the video onto your phone. Once downloaded, the download button will change to a play button, which you can then click on to play the video. 

To delete a quiz, click on the delete button for the appropriate quiz. Note: You can't update quiz questions once they have been added, as this may cause an unfair comparison between the results of the users. 

You will be able to search for specific quizzes and users by typing into the search bar at the top of the appropriate screen

As a user, you will be able to take quizzes that have been set by the admin user, as well as view your results for the quizzes you take. 

To take a quiz, go to the Quizzes page and click on the quiz you would like to take. Each quiz can have one video tutorial for it. To download a video, click on the download button next to the appropriate quiz. If there is a video to download, the app will download it. Once it has been downloaded, the download button will change to a play button, which can then be clicked on to watch the video. If the admin posts a new video that replaces one you have downloaded, you will be told about the new video and the video you had already downloaded will be deleted. 

To retake a quiz, go to the Past Quizzes page and click on a quiz that you would like to retake. This page will also show the marks you received for each test. 

If you would like to see your average mark and your ranking compared to other users, click on the Statistics page.
